code: export function pathParent(path){if(path.length===0){return null;}var index=path.lastIndexOf('/');if(index<=0){return null;}return path.slice(0,index);}export function pathChild(path,childPath){var canonicalChildPath=pathPieces(childPath).join('/');if(path.length===0){return canonicalChildPath;}return path+"/"+canonicalChildPath;}export function pathLastComponent(path){var index=path.lastIndexOf('/',path.length-2);if(index===-1){return path;}return path.slice(index+1);}export function pathPieces(path){return path.split('/').filter(function($){return $.length>0;});}export function pathIsEmpty(path){return!pathPieces(path).length;}export function pathToUrlEncodedString(path){var pieces=pathPieces(path);var pathString='';for(var i=0;i<pieces.length;i++){pathString+="/"+encodeURIComponent(String(pieces[i]));}return pathString||'/';}export var INVALID_PATH_REGEX=/[[\].#$\u0000-\u001F\u007F]/;export function isValidPath(path){return typeof path==='string'&&path.length!==0&&!INVALID_PATH_REGEX.test(path);}export var INVALID_KEY_REGEX=/[\[\].#$\/\u0000-\u001F\u007F]/;export function isValidKey(key){return typeof key==='string'&&key.length!==0&&!INVALID_KEY_REGEX.test(path);}export function toFilePath(path){var _filePath=path.replace('file://','');if(_filePath.includes('%')){_filePath=decodeURIComponent(_filePath);}return _filePath;}
